summary: Samson is a young whale that doesn't have friends. He spends his time listening to his mother's stories about the legendary whale Moby Dick. Samson becomes fascinated about it and decides to go on a journey to find Moby Dick.
cast: Jesper Klein|Helle Hertz|Per Pallesen|Bodil Udsen|Poul Thomsen|Kirsten Peüliche|Berthe Qvistgaard|Claus Ryskjær|Preben Neergaard|Ole Ernst|Staffan Hallerstam|Mathias Henrikson|Heinz Hopf|Ingvar Kjellson|Louise Ræder|Marilyn Schreffler|Meta Velander|Frank Welker
title: Samson og Sally
